articles.title: Deepak Chahar And Jaya Bharadwaj Set To Get Married | SEE Photos Of Viral Wedding Card - India.com
articles.description: Chennai Super Kings bowler Deepak Chahar is all set to get married to his girlfriend Jaya Bharadwaj on June 1st, 2022. Here is a viral photo of his wedding card. As per reports Chennai Super Kings captain MS Dhoni will also be there in Chahar's wedding in Agr…
articles.content:
Image credit: InstagramDeepak Chahar And Jaya Bharadwaj Set To Get Married
Deepak Chahar and Jaya Bhardwaj are all set to tie the knot next month, according to several reports.
